title: 53B.62 PERMISSIBLE INVESTMENTS.

in: funds in accounts held for the benefit of the licensee's customers
ACH items in transit to the licensee
ACH items or international wires in transit to a payee
cash in transit via armored car
debit card or credit card funded transmission receivables owed by any bank
money market mutual funds rated AAA
senior debt obligations of an insured depository institution
obligation of a commission, agency, or instrumentality of the United States
obligation guaranteed fully as to principal and interest by the United States
obligation of a state or a governmental subdivision, agency, or instrumentality

variables.name: investment_type
variables.description: The type of investment being evaluated.

variables.name: insured_depository_institution
variables.description: Whether the institution is an insured depository institution.

variables.name: federal_credit_union
variables.description: Whether the institution is a federal credit union.

variables.description: The type of investment being evaluated.

variables.name: beneficiary
variables.description: The beneficiary of the letter of credit.

variables.name: issuer_type
variables.description: The type of institution issuing the letter of credit.

variables.name: irrevocable
variables.description: Whether the letter of credit is irrevocable.

variables.name: unconditional
variables.description: Whether the letter of credit is unconditional.

variables.name: automatic_extension
variables.description: Whether the letter of credit has automatic extension.

variables.description: The type of investment being evaluated.

variables.name: exceeds_average_daily_money_transmission_liability
variables.description: The percentage by which the surety bond or deposit exceeds the average daily money transmission liability.

variables.description: The type of investment being evaluated.

variables.name: age_of_receivables
variables.description: The age of the receivables in days.

variables.name: percentage_of_total_permissible_investments
variables.description: The percentage of total permissible investments that the receivables represent.

variables.name: satisfactory_rating
variables.description: Whether the licensee has received a satisfactory rating in the most recent examination.

variables.name: eligible_rating
variables.description: Whether the foreign depository institution has an eligible rating.

variables.name: FATCA_registered
variables.description: Whether the foreign depository institution is registered under the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act.

variables.name: not_sanctioned
variables.description: Whether the foreign depository institution is not located in a country subject to sanctions from the Office of Foreign Asset Control.

variables.name: not_high_risk
variables.description: Whether the foreign depository institution is not located in a high-risk or noncooperative jurisdiction.
